fields.archetype_traits: Brave, determined, flawed yet resilient, driven by duty or destiny.
Wise, nurturing, patient, often symbolic of the higher self or conscience.
Powerful, driven, intelligent, mirrors the hero's inner conflict.
Clever, playful, unpredictable, often the voice of truth through mischief.
Mysterious, alluring, inconsistent, often dual-natured and hard to trust.
Stern, protective, testing, loyal to the status quo.
Supportive, brave, dependable, often grounding the hero emotionally.
Passionate, alluring, manipulative, devoted to their own desires or mission.
Irreverent, paradoxical, highly creative, focused on the application of science.
Pure, trusting, often naive; possesses very few stats but high potential for empathy.
Extremely capable in combat, loyal, high-spirited, often lacks the narrative depth of the Hero.
Brutal, relentless, powerful, often simplistic in motive but cataclysmic in effect.
